args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set

/-!
Lemma: Given a topological space X covered by open sets U a (a : Î±) and a path x : â„ â†’ X
continuous on Icc 0 1, there exist partition points 0 = t_0 < ... < t_n = 1 and indices a_0..a_{n-1}
such that each image x " Icc(t_i, t_{i+1}) is contained in some U (a_i).
-/

variable {X : Type _} [TopologicalSpace X] {Î± : Type _}

lemma path_subcover_segments (U : Î± â†’ Set X)
  (hcover : (â‹ƒ a, U a) = (univ : Set X))
  (hopen : âˆ€ a, IsOpen (U a))
  {x : â„ â†’ X} (hcont : ContinuousOn x (Icc (0 : â„) 1)) :
  âˆƒ (n : â„•) (t : Fin (n+1) â†’ â„) (a : Fin n â†’ Î±),
    StrictMono t âˆ§ t 0 = 0 âˆ§ t (Fin.last n) = 1 âˆ§
    âˆ€ i : Fin n, x '' (Icc (t (Fin.castSucc i)) (t (Fin.succ (Fin.castSucc i)))) âŠ† U (a i) := by sorry
